name: Europa Europa
tagline: A boy in Nazi Germany, trying to conceal that he is Jewish, joins the Hitler Youth.

name: Dream a Little Dream
tagline: An accident puts the consciousness of an elderly dream researcher into the body of a bratty teenager. The problem? The kid prefers dreamworld limbo to real life.

name: Delirious
tagline: A soap opera writer gets hit on the head and wakes up as a character in his own show.

name: For Your Consideration
tagline: Three actors learn that their respective performances in the film "Home for Purim," a drama set in the mid-1940s American South, are generating award-season buzz.

name: Kundun
tagline: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.

name: Wind
tagline: Will Parker, played by Matthew Modine, loses the Americas Cup, the worlds biggest sailing prize, to the Australians and decides to form his own syndicate to win it back.

name: Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters
tagline: An action epic that explores the origins of the Aqua Teen Hunger Force (better known as Master Shake, Frylock, and Meatwad,) who somehow become pitted in a battle over an immortal piece of exercise equipment.

name: Heartbreak Hotel
tagline: When a teen tries to set up a band at his school, his mother who was a big fan of Elvis Presley gets in a wreck he and his band members decides to kidnap Elvis and have him hooked up with his mother.

name: Downfall
tagline: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

name: Rescue Dawn
tagline: A US Fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War.

name: A Scanner Darkly
tagline: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

name: Slums of Beverly Hills
tagline: This semiautobiographical story follows a lower-middle-class teenager (Lyonne) and her neurotic family in 1976 Tinseltown.

name: Livin' Large!
tagline: A young black reporter begins to lose his identity.

name: Little Children
tagline: The lives of two lovelorn spouses from separate marriages, a registered sex offender, and a disgraced ex-police officer intersect as they struggle to resist their vulnerabilities and temptations in suburban Connecticut.

name: Eve of Destruction
tagline: A terrorist hunter is hired by a scientist to deactivate her android double, a walking, talking, murderous nuclear bomb which has gone amok in the big city and is about to explode.

name: Troll
tagline: A wicked troll king in search of a mystical ring that will return him to his human form invades a San Francisco apartment complex where a powerful witch lives.

name: Monkeybone
tagline: In a coma, a cartoonist finds himself trapped within his own underground creation and must find a way to get back, while racing against his popular but treacherous character, Monkeybone.

name: The Sicilian
tagline: Egocentric bandit Salvatore Giuliano fights the Church, the Mafia, and the landed gentry while leading a populist movement for Sicilian independence.

name: Racing with the Moon
tagline: In 1942 California, two young men await induction into the U.S. Marines and say goodbye to their girlfriends.

name: Before Sunrise
tagline: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

name: Amores Perros
tagline: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

name: The Human Stain
tagline: When a disgraced former college professor has a romance with a mysterious younger woman haunted by her dark twisted past, he is forced to confront a shocking secret about his own life that he has kept secret for 50 years.

name: Airheads
tagline: Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head DJ refuses to play them.

name: Second Sight
tagline: John Larroquette is the head of a detective agency that is hired to find a missing person, probably kidnapped. They employ the help of a mystic/psychic to help find the missing girl.

name: The Guard
tagline: An unorthodox Irish policeman with a confrontational personality is teamed up with an uptight FBI agent to investigate an international drug-smuggling ring.

name: October Baby
tagline: A college freshman's world is rocked when she learns she is the adopted survivor of an attempted foeticide.

name: Shine a Light
tagline: A career-spanning documentary on the Rolling Stones, with concert footage from their "A Bigger Bang" tour.

name: Margin Call
tagline: Follows the key people at an investment bank, over a 24-hour period, during the early stages of the financial crisis.

name: Monkey Shines
tagline: A quadriplegic man has a trained monkey help him with his paralysis, until the little monkey begins to develop feelings, and rage, against its new master.

name: Bread and Tulips
tagline: After being forgotten in a highway café during a bus trip, a housewife decides to start a new life by herself in Venice.

name: Made
tagline: Two aspiring boxers, lifelong friends, get involved in a money-laundering scheme through a low-level organized crime group.

name: Won't Back Down
tagline: Two determined mothers­, one a teacher, look to transform their children's failing inner city school. Facing a powerful and entrenched bureaucracy, they risk everything to make a difference in the education and future of their children.

name: Whatever Works
tagline: A middle-aged, misanthropic divorce surprisingly enters into a fulfilling Pygmalion type relationship with a much younger, unsophisticated Southern girl.

name: Angels and Insects
tagline: In the 1800s a naturalist marries into a family of British aristocrats.

name: Once Upon a Time in America
tagline: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

production.name: Mediastream Zweite Film GmbH & Co. Productions KG

name: Gardens of Stone
tagline: A sergeant must deal with his desires to save the lives of young soldiers being sent to Vietnam. Continuously denied the chance to teach the soldiers about his experiences, he settles for trying to help the son of an old army buddy.

name: Visiting Hours
tagline: A crazed, women-hating killer (Ironside) attacks journalist Deborah Ballin (Grant). When he discovers that his attack didn't kill Deborah, he comes to the hospital to finish what he started.

name: Black and White
tagline: A group of white high school teens become involved with Harlem's black hip-hop crowd.

name: Cave of Forgotten Dreams

production.name: Ministère de la Culture et de la Communication

tagline: Werner Herzog gains exclusive access to film inside the Chauvet caves of Southern France and captures the oldest known pictorial creations of humanity.

name: Hollywood Shuffle
tagline: An actor limited to stereotypical roles because of his ethnicity, dreams of making it big as a highly respected performer. As he makes his rounds, the film takes a satiric look at African American actors in Hollywood.

name: The In Crowd
tagline: A mentally disturbed young woman takes a job at a posh country club and falls in with a clique of wealthy college kids where she's taken under the wing of the clique's twisted leader, who harbors some dark secrets too terrifying to tell.

name: Farewell My Concubine
tagline: The story of two men, who met as apprentices in the Peking Opera, and stayed friends for over 50 years.

name: Bad Education
tagline: An examination on the effect of Franco-era religious schooling and sexual abuse on the lives of two longtime friends.

name: Bandslam
tagline: A new kid in town assembles a fledgling rock band -- together, they achieve their dreams and compete against the best in the biggest event of the year, a battle of the bands.

name: Formula 51
tagline: An American master chemist plans to score big on a once in a lifetime drug deal. All does not go as planned and he is soon entangled in a web of deceit.

name: The Yearling
tagline: A boy persuades his parents to allow him to adopt a young deer, but what will happen if the deer misbehaves?

name: The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest
tagline: Lisbeth is recovering in a hospital and awaiting trial for three murders when she is released. Mikael must prove her innocence, but Lisbeth must be willing to share the details of her sordid experiences with the court.

name: The Object of Beauty
tagline: This story is about a ne'er do well and his girlfriend search for a thief.

name: The Wind Rises
tagline: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

name: Alone in the Dark

production.name: Boll Kino Beteiligungs GmbH & Co. KG

tagline: Based on the video game, Alone in the Dark focuses on Edward Carnby, a detective of the paranormal, who slowly unravels a mysterious events with deadly results.

name: The Company You Keep
tagline: A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who has discovered his identity.

name: The World's Fastest Indian
tagline: The life story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years building a 1920 Indian motorcycle -- a bike which helped him set the land-speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

name: Grind
tagline: Four skaters follow their idol on his summer tour in an attempt to get noticed, get sponsored, and become stars themselves.

name: Gossip
tagline: Three college students chose a class project on Gossip and how fast it spreads, which spirals out of control.

name: Of Mice and Men
tagline: Two drifters, one a gentle but slow giant, try to make money working the fields during the Depression so they can fulfill their dreams.

name: Biutiful
tagline: This is the story of Uxbal, a man living in this world, but able to see his death, which guides his every move.

name: The Hotel New Hampshire
tagline: The film talks about a family that weathers all sorts of disasters and keeps going in spite of it all. It is noted for its wonderful assortment of oddball characters.

name: Romantic Comedy
tagline: Two of the screen's finest comic actors, Dudley Moore and Mary Steenburgen, star as successful writing partners whose timing is perfect on stage but amusingly pathetic in their love life. In HD.

name: Sunshine
tagline: The fate of a Hungarian Jewish family throughout the 20th century.

name: Top Dog
tagline: With his cop companion shot and killed by terrorists, Reno The Dog pairs up with tough cop Jake in thwarting the criminal organization.

name: Miller's Crossing
tagline: Tom Regan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

name: Celebrity
tagline: The fortunes of a husband and wife differ drastically after they divorce.

name: The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada
tagline: Ranch hand Pete Perkins looks to fulfill the promise to his recently deceased best friend by burying him in his hometown in Mexico.

name: Woman on Top
tagline: Brazilian chef Isabella Oliveira moves to San Francisco when her husband, frustrated by her motion sickness, cheats on her.

name: La Femme Nikita
tagline: Convicted felon Nikita, instead of going to jail, is given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

name: Alien Adventure
tagline: Aliens arrive on Earth and explore an amusement park thinking it it is a modern city.

name: Moon
tagline: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

name: Broken Embraces
tagline: Harry Caine, a blind writer, reaches this moment in time when he has to heal his wounds from 14 years back. He was then still known by his real name, Mateo Blanco, and directing his last movie.

name: Birth
tagline: A young boy attempts to convince a woman that he is her dead husband reborn.

name: I Am Love
tagline: A tragic love story set at the turn of the millennium in Milan. The film follows the fall of the haute bourgeoisie due to the forces of passion and unconditional love.

name: Darling Lili
tagline: Set during WWI, this movie is a cute spin on the Mata Hari legend.

name: The Beast from 20,000 Fathoms
tagline: A ferocious dinosaur awakened by an Arctic atomic test terrorizes the North Atlantic and ultimately New York City.

name: Frances
tagline: The true story of Frances Farmer's meteoric rise to fame in Hollywood and the tragic turn her life took when she was blacklisted.

name: Destination Moon
tagline: One of the first science fiction films to attempt a high level of accurate technical detail tells the story of the first trip to the moon.
